Package com.ibm.watson.dsm.services.gaian

Provides a distributed neighbor monitoring system for the gaian database nodes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    INeighborProvider
    Defines methods to interact with Gaian neighbor node information.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GaianNeighborOnlyTopologyMonitor
    Proxies the DSM-configured IPhysicalTopologyMonitor to restrict lookups to only return information about neighbors as defined by the Gaian implementation of INeighborProvider.
    GaianOpinionManager
    Provides a distributed rule-based system to collaborate with neighbors to build a local opinion about each neighbor.
    GaianOpinionReader  
    GaianRuleEngine
    This extends the superclass only to override GaianRuleEngine.evaluateTupleRules(boolean, com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.tuples.ITupleSet...) so as to capture the injection of a reset tuple which we want to cause all tables to be cleared.
    ObservationSimulator  
    PhysicalTopologyMonitorProxy  

Package com.ibm.watson.dsm.services.gaian Description

Provides a distributed neighbor monitoring system for the gaian database nodes. 
 try {
        INeighborProvider provider = new MyNeighborProvider();
        GaianNeighborMonitor monitor = new GaianNeighborMonitor("me", "monitor.dsm", provider);
        monitor.start();
        ...
        monitor.setObservation("you", .2);
        ...
        Map opinions = monitor.getOpinions();
        
        ...
        
        monitor.stop();
        
} catch (DSMException e) {
        // TODO Auto-generated catch block
        e.printStackTrace();
}
